content:
PortalManagementAddress Class

Definition

Represents the address for the portal management.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Name="PortalRedirect", Namespace="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2010/10/servicebus/connect")]
public class PortalManagementAddress
